certificateConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to issue the certificates?

batchTip.message: Are you sure you want to issue certificates to all eligible students? Please be aware that once certificates are issued, it can’t be modified or recalled

certificateMaTip.message: Only course teachers or admin can manage and issue certificates

certSummary.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理

certSummary2.message: Total: {total} | Qualified: {qualified} | Unqualified: {unqualified} | Achievement Rate: {rate}% | Excellence Rate: {excellent}%
certSummary2.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理

assessRule1.description:

assessRule2.description:
教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理 
 学生账户 -> 考核 -> 课程证书

assessRule3.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理

explanationContent.message: Based on the final grade when the certificate was issued. Updated final grade won't change the qualifications and type of certificate already issued.

noCourseAssessment.message: The certificates cannot be issued for the courses which have not set the grading rules.

certificateTip1.message: The certificate has been issued and modification of the certificate settings is not supported

certificateTip2.message: Notes: Grading rules have to be set before you set up certificates.

gradeRule1.message: Final grade ≥ {input} points for Certificate of Achievement
gradeRule1.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理 -> 证书设置

gradeRule2.message: Final grade ≥ {inputLow} points but < {inputHigh} points for Certificate of Achievement
gradeRule2.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理 -> 证书设置

gradeRule3.message: Final grade ≥ {input} points for Certificate of Excellence
gradeRule3.description: 教师账户 -> 考核 -> 证书管理 -> 证书设置

setPassAndExcellence.message: Both Certificate of Achievement and Certificate of Excellence

enterScoreTip.message: Enter the correct score with only one decimal place

enterScoreTip1.message: The score entered should not exceed the possible points set for the final grade.

enterScoreTip2.message: Achievement score cannot be higher than excellence score

enterScoreTip3.message: Only the class admin can set certificates

enterScoreTip4.message: Some certificates have already been issued. Certificate qualifications cannot be modified.

qualifiedCert2.message: Congratulations for having successfully completed the course of {coursename}. You are awarded the Certificate of Achievement.

excellentCert2.message: Congratulations for having successfully completed the course of  {coursename}. You are awarded the Certificate of Excellence.

qualifiedNotice.message: You have reached the minimum course score required for the Certificate of Achievement and satisfied the certificate qualifications. Congratulations!
qualifiedNotice.description: 学生账户 -> 考核 -> 课程证书 (教师发放证书后，才会显示)

excellentNotice.message: You have reached the minimum course score required for the Certificate of Excellence and satisfied the certificate qualifications. Congratulations!
excellentNotice.description: 学生账户 -> 考核 -> 课程证书 (教师发放证书后，才会显示)

certificateStuTip.message: Notes: Certificates won't be updated once they are issued, even if your course grade was changed.

certTip.message: To assure accuracy of the information on the certificates, please {informLink}
certTip.description: 学生账户 -> 考核 -> 课程证书 (还未发放证书时，才会显示)

informLink.message: complete your profile information (if you haven't done yet).

notSetCerTip.message: Your teacher has not set up any course certificate.
